Attributes.description: Chinese thought from its beginnings until the Han dynasty (206 BCE to 220 CE) in its historical and cultural contexts. Includes, among others: Confucius; Mo Zi; the Legalists/Authoritarians; Zhuang Zi; the Lao Zi book.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 15:30, End Time: 17:00
